info.title: OData Service for namespace ProductService
info.description:
This OData service is located at [http://localhost/Products.svc/](http://localhost/Products.svc/)

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](http://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Product{bg:orange}],[Product]-*>[Category],[Product]-0..1>[PeopleService.Supplier{bg:whitesmoke}],[Product]-0..1>[ProductDetail],[Product]^[FeaturedProduct{bg:orange}],[FeaturedProduct]-0..1>[Advertisement],[ProductDetail{bg:orange}],[ProductDetail]-0..1>[Product],[Category{bg:orange}],[Category]-*>[Product],[Advertisement{bg:orange}],[Advertisement]-0..1>[FeaturedProduct])

## References
- [PeopleService](?url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oasis-tcs/odata-openapi/master/examples/People.openapi.json)
